message.help-message: Welcome to Sagrada! Usage: -h/--help Get this help message -a/--server-address ipv4_address Set the ip address of the server -s/--additional-schemas Choose to play with additional schemas -t/--turn-time time_in_seconds Set the maximum time for a turn -l/--lobby-time time_in_seconds Set the lobby timer length By choosing no options default options will be set: ip: 127.0.0.1
